mapper.select:
with temp_paint_block as ( select project_no ,revision ,area_code ,min(area_desc) as area_desc from stx_dis_pis_block where project_no = #{project_no} and revision = #{revision} group by project_no, revision, area_code ) select (case group_id when 15 then null when 31 then t12.pe_code else (case when t12.item_gbn = 1 then t12.pe_code else null end) end) as pe_code ,(case when group_id = 15 then t12.area_code || chr(10) || 'Total' when group_id = 31 then 'S/P Area' else (case when t12.item_gbn = 1 then t12.area_code else null end) end) as area_code ,(case when group_id = 15 then null when group_id = 31 then to_char(sp_area) else (case when t12.item_gbn = 1 then t12.area_desc else null end) end) as area_desc ,(case when group_id in (15,31) then null else (case when t12.item_gbn = 1 then t12.paint_count else null end) end) as paint_count ,(case when group_id = 15 then null when group_id = 31 then 'Paint Area' else t12.paint_item end) as paint_item ,(case when group_id = 15 then null when group_id = 31 then to_char(paint_area) else t12.item_desc end) as item_desc ,(case when group_id in (15,31) then null else t12.paint_dft end) as paint_dft ,(case when group_id = 31 then null else t12.area end) as area ,(case when group_id = 31 then null else t12.quantity end) as quantity ,(case when group_id = 31 then null else t12.theory_quantity end) as theory_quantity ,(case when group_id in (15,31) then null else (case when t12.item_gbn = 1 then t12.paint_stage else null end) end) as paint_stage ,(case when group_id in (15,31) then null else (case when t12.item_gbn = 1 then t12.paint_tsr else null end) end) as paint_tsr ,(case when group_id in (15,31) then null else (case when t12.item_gbn = 1 then t12.season_code else null end) end) as season_code , t12.group_id from ( select t10.pe_code ,t10.area_code ,(select area_desc from stx_dis_pis_area where area_code = t10.area_code) as area_desc ,t10.paint_count ,t10.paint_item ,t11.item_desc ,t10.item_gbn ,t10.season_code
,min(t10.paint_tsr) as paint_tsr ,min(t10.paint_stage) as paint_stage ,min(decode(t10.item_gbn, 1, t10.paint_dft, null)) as paint_dft ,sum(decode(t10.item_gbn, 1, t10.pe_area, null)) as area ,sum(t10.pe_quantity) as quantity ,sum(t10.pe_theory_quantity) as theory_quantity
,sum(decode(t10.paint_count,1,decode(t10.item_gbn,1,t10.pe_area,0),0)) as sp_area ,sum(decode(t10.item_gbn,1,t10.pe_area,0)) as paint_area
,grouping_id(t10.pe_code, t10.area_code, t10.paint_count, t10.season_code, t10.paint_item, t10.item_gbn) as group_id from ( select t1.project_no ,t1.revision ,t1.pattern_code ,t1.block_code ,t1.pe_code ,t1.pre_pe_code ,t1.zone_code ,t1.area_code ,t3.area_desc ,t1.season_code ,t1.paint_count ,(case when t4.item_gbn = 1 then t1.paint_item else (select thinner_code from stx_dis_item where item_code = t1.paint_item and rownum = 1) end) as paint_item ,t1.paint_dft ,t1.paint_stage ,round(t1.paint_svr * 10 / t1.paint_dft,3) as paint_tsr ,t1.paint_svr ,(case when t4.item_gbn = 1 then t1.pre_loss else null end) as pre_loss ,(case when t4.item_gbn = 1 then t1.post_loss else null end) as post_loss ,(case when t4.item_gbn = 1 then round(10000 / (100 - t1.pre_loss)) else null end) as pre_loss_rate ,(case when t4.item_gbn = 1 then round(10000 / (100 - t1.post_loss)) else null end) as post_loss_rate ,(case when t4.item_gbn = 1 then t1.block_area else null end) as block_area ,(case when t4.item_gbn = 1 then t1.pe_area else null end) as pe_area ,(case when t4.item_gbn = 1 then t1.hull_area else null end) as hull_area ,(case when t4.item_gbn = 1 then t1.quay_area else null end) as quay_area ,(case when t4.item_gbn = 1 then t1.pre_pe_area else null end) as pre_pe_area ,(case when t4.item_gbn = 1 then t1.block_quantity else round(t1.block_quantity * 0.15, 3) end) as block_quantity ,(case when t4.item_gbn = 1 then t1.pe_quantity else round(t1.pe_quantity * 0.15, 3) end) as pe_quantity ,(case when t4.item_gbn = 1 then t1.hull_quantity else round(t1.hull_quantity * 0.15, 3) end) as hull_quantity ,(case when t4.item_gbn = 1 then t1.quay_quantity else round(t1.quay_quantity * 0.15, 3) end) as quay_quantity ,(case when t4.item_gbn = 1 then t1.pre_pe_quantity else ,(case when t4.item_gbn = 1 then t1.pe_theory_quantity else round(t1.pe_theory_quantity * 0.15, 3) end) as pe_theory_quantity ,(case when t4.item_gbn = 1 then t1.hull_theory_quantity else round(t1.hull_theory_quantity * 0.15, 3) end) as hull_theory_quantity ,(case when t4.item_gbn = 1 then t1.quay_theory_quantity else round(t1.quay_theory_quantity * 0.15, 3) end) as quay_theory_quantity ,(case when t4.item_gbn = 1 then t1.pre_pe_theory_quantity else round(t1.pre_pe_theory_quantity * 0.15, 3) end) as pre_pe_theory_quantity ,t1.define_flag ,t1.block_define_flag ,t1.pe_define_flag ,t1.pre_pe_define_flag ,t1.hull_define_flag ,t1.quay_define_flag ,t4.item_gbn from stx_dis_pis_pattern_scheme t1 ,temp_paint_block t3 ,stx_dis_pis_pe t5 ,(select 1 as item_gbn from dual union all select 2 as item_gbn from dual) t4 where t1.project_no = #{project_no} and t1.revision = #{revision} and t1.project_no = t3.project_no and t1.revision = t3.revision and t1.area_code = t3.area_code and t1.project_no = t5.project_no(+) and t1.revision = t5.revision(+) and t1.block_code = t5.block_code(+) and t1.pe_define_flag = 'Y' and t1.pe_area > 0 and t1.pe_quantity > 0
and t1.pe_code in ( '${code_list}' )
) t10 , stx_dis_item t11
where t10.paint_item = t11.item_code group by grouping sets((t10.pe_code, t10.area_code, t10.area_desc, t10.paint_count, t10.season_code, t10.paint_item, t11.item_desc, t10.item_gbn), (t10.pe_code, t10.area_code, t10.area_desc),(t10.pe_code)) order by t10.pe_code, t10.area_code, t10.paint_count, t10.season_code, t10.paint_item ) t12
